graphql.query:
mutation($name: String!,
    $status : String,
    $attachments : JSON,
    $free_support : JSON,
    $fee_support : JSON,
    $categories : JSON,
    $demo_link : String,
    $price : Float,
    $sale_price : Float) {
    create_dev_project(input: {
        name: $name,
    status : $status,
    attachments : $attachments,
    free_support : $free_support,
    fee_support : $fee_support,
    categories : $categories,
    demo_link : $demo_link,
    price : $price,
    sale_price : $sale_price
    }) {
    id
    user{
        id
    }
    name
    status
    attachments
    free_support
    fee_support
    categories
    demo_link
    price
    sale_price
  }
}

mutation(
    $id:ID!
    $name: String,
    $status : String,
    $attachments : JSON,
    $free_support : JSON,
    $fee_support : JSON,
    $categories : JSON,
    $demo_link : String,
    $price : String,
    $sale_price : String) {
    edit_dev_project(input: {
        id:$id,
        name: $name,
    status : $status,
    attachments : $attachments,
    free_support : $free_support,
    fee_support : $fee_support,
    categories : $categories,
    demo_link : $demo_link,
    price : $price,
    sale_price : $sale_price
    }) {
    id
    name
    status
    attachments
    free_support
    fee_support
    categories
    demo_link
    price
    sale_price
  }
}

mutation(
    $id:ID
    $name: String,
    $status : String,
    $attachments : JSON,
    $free_support : JSON,
    $fee_support : JSON,
    $categories : JSON,
    $demo_link : String,
    $price : String,
    $sale_price : String) {
    upsert_dev_project(input: {
        id:$id,
        name: $name,
    status : $status,
    attachments : $attachments,
    free_support : $free_support,
    fee_support : $fee_support,
    categories : $categories,
    demo_link : $demo_link,
    price : $price,
    sale_price : $sale_price
    }) {
    id
    name
    status
    attachments
    free_support
    fee_support
    categories
    demo_link
    price
    sale_price
  }
}

query(
    $search_key: String,
    $category : String
    $per_page:Int, 
    $current_page:Int, 
    $sort_field : String,
    $sort_order : String
    ){
    searchDevProjects(
        input:{
        search_key: $search_key,
        per_page:$per_page
        category:$category
        current_page:$current_page
        sort_field : $sort_field
        sort_order : $sort_order
     }){
         devProjects{
            id
            name
            price
            categories
         }
         paginator{
             total
             per_page
             current_page
             last_page
         }
    # name
    # status
    # attachments
    # free_support
    # fee_support
    # categories
    # demo_link
    # price
    # sale_price
    }
}

query(
    $id: ID,
    $limit : Int
    ){
    similarDevProjects(
        id: $id,
        limit:$limit
     ){
            id
            name
            price
            categories
       
    # name
    # status
    # attachments
    # free_support
    # fee_support
    # categories
    # demo_link
    # price
    # sale_price
    }
}

mutation(
    $id:ID!,
    $name: String 
    $description: String
    $attachments : JSON
    $type_currency : String
    $payment_type : String
    $price_range : String) {
    edit_customer_project(input: {
        id:$id
    name: $name
    description: $description
    attachments : $attachments
    payment_type : $payment_type
    type_currency : $type_currency
    price_range : $price_range
    }) {
    id
    user{
        id
    }
    name
    description
    attachments
    payment_type
    type_currency
    price_range
  }
}
